title: Download: OnePlus 10 Pro gets its first Android 13 beta update for early adopters
content:
Google released the first Android 13 Beta back in April, enabling not just developers but also curious users to fiddle with the upcoming version of Android. Although the beta release is currently limited to Googleâ€™s own lineup of Pixel smartphones, many other OEMs are likely to follow in the footsteps and release Android 13 betas

The post Download: OnePlus 10 Pro gets its first Android 13 beta update for early adopters appeared first on XDA.
description: OnePlus is among the first Android OEMs to release Android 13 Beta for its flagship OnePlus 10 Pro. Check it out!
